website_summaries.verdict: Once you find the right size, this thermal set is worth a close look if you're searching for soft and warm tops and bottoms.
pros: Women seeking full-body comfort will enjoy the soft fleece-lined top and bottom in this set
Each piece can be worn alone or as a base layer
cons: Sizing issues are a relatively common complaint
Many consumers warn that while the pants run true to size, the top runs quite small

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these thermals in different colors for myself and someone else. Both items were purchased the same day and arrived on the same day, however the packaging was very different. One set was brand labeled "UYES" while tge other had no labeling for the brand, only the materials and wash instructions. I don't like how one brand could be so inconsistent where even the neckline was a different pattern. I am no expert on design, but these two are very different. The quality seems to be poor stitch work, but the material is soft. Hopefully they keep us warm.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!! Dye is not set.
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when I took this set out of the package. I smoothed the set out with my hands to see if I felt sizing was correct. My hands were black! I washed them thinking that perhaps the plastic bag had been dirty and did the same thing again. Color again came off on my hands. I then took a paper towel and ran it down the length of the pants and the towel had black all over it, much like soot. There is a serious problem here. Returning and hope Amazon will check with the company.
customer_reviews.author: Ksa

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 sizes up!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this outfit to wear for a mother/baby winter theme photo shoot. It was presented/packaged in a freezer zip lock bag. I ordered the color beige. It is of high quality material, but I believe the sizing is way off. I did order a size larger as recommended, but it still was way too tight. I usually wear a size xs. I ordered a size small, one size up and was still way too small. The size small is equivalent to a kids size 12. This would be a great value for the quality of the item if they would just adjust their sizes...
customer_reviews.author: Abigail’s Mama

customer_reviews.title: Seam ripped in an hour
customer_reviews.text: The forbid too small. I am 5'3" and 130 lbs. It is a snug fit which is still comfortable, but the seam ripped within 1 hour of wearing. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emmiqueen

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two, got two different brands!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sizes and two colors, I got two totally different packages and the items themselves and very very different. One is heavier than the other and they have different necklines. (See pictures) I like the brown more but now if I try to order a different color I might not get the same one! I am not even sure what I will get. Be aware that they’re not consistent. It also has a little static when I wear it, something you might not like.
customer_reviews.author: Gg

customer_reviews.title: NOT FLEECE LINED!
customer_reviews.text: NOT fleeced lined!! This is made out of some sort of shiny fabric that pulls at your fine hairs and skin imperfections, causing itchiness under clothing. The inside "lining" if you can call it that is just the same fabric as the outside that's been brushed slightly to give it a slightly different look and feel.. definitely NOT fleece lines.. so disappointed! I work out side all day and was really hoping this would keep me warm! As it is its very uncomfortable, itchy and not much warmer than adding a second jersey underneath regular clothing!
customer_reviews.author: Crysse2

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, quality material that fits well
customer_reviews.text: Very SOFT!! I was so happy with this set! It’s really warm and soft on the inside. It’s also soft on the outside but more smooth. It’s very good quality. I’m 5’5 and my weight varies from 130-145lbs and a large was perfect for me! The shirt was a little longer than I expected but it’s more help in trying to stay warm. My best friend is also 5’5 but her weight is more 110-120lbs and she got a medium that fit her well so I think it’s more about weight than height. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria K

customer_reviews.title: Warm, but came with an awful smell.
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive what was pictured. Top is ribbed from chest down, with ribbing detail at each wrist. There is no designated front and back to the bottoms, they are made the same, however, I'm finding that most thermal underwear are made like that. Bought them for warmth and that they definitely are. They arrived with an absolutely horrible smell. Similar to a fuel smell from a manufacturing plant. I have tried washing them numerous times and with different products and there's still a faint smell. I hope eventually it will be gone. I am 5'3", 115 lbs and ordered a medium, which fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: vgm

customer_reviews.title: She liked them so much
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware!! I bought three of these for my wife which WERE fleece lined and the soft spandex style outer layer. She liked them so much, I ordered three more. This time, the product was totally different from a different manufacturer even though the packaging was identical to the first order. They were not fleece lined and the outer layer was different. You could actually see through them if you held them up to the window. Doubt very much if these will be as warm as the other ones and I'm sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: GCC

customer_reviews.title: Quality set all the way! Won’t bunch up when you put your clothes on over them!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed from the packaging it comes in to the stitching to the feel of the fabric inside and out! Love love love these thermal underwear! They are soft, cozy fleece on the inside and sleek on the outside so that whatever you’re wearing over them glides right on! Double stitched at the neck and sleeves and a nice 1” wide elastic true waistband on the bottoms. Truly pleased with this purchase. Also I am 5’4” tall and weigh 204 lbs and I bought a XL. 38D chest. There is room to spare in the fit just a bit. I don’t like things snug so it’s great with me!
customer_reviews.author: Gr8fllady2

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thermal underwear set top and bottom to wear in Iceland which I did for a week. I wasn't sure about the product since I live in Alabama and not use to buying thermal anything but there were perfect, very warm and soft. The are very form fitting which I guess they are supposed to be since they fit under clothes. I am 5'5" and weigh 145 and the large fit snugly but not tightly. They are a good value for the money. I hope they will hold up over the long term as my next winter destination is Antarctica.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnne Cates

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, warm long underwear
customer_reviews.text: These run somewhat small, so size accordingly. I wear a size 10-12 and purchased XL. They did have a strong smell out of the package, but they washed well and are very soft on the skin. They worked well on a recent trip to Europe and fit well under other clothing. They added warmth and were a great layering piece. The silky surface on the outside of the underwear allows jeans and sweaters to slip on smoothly. Make sure you consult the size chart, but don't hesitate to buy these as they are a good value and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: CabushkaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Good fit. Great color and seems to be really warm
customer_reviews.text: This set is really comfortable. Itʻs got a flannel lining and a strong outer fabric. The pants have a wide elastic band that could be a bit tighter for me, but itʻs ok loose as it is. the top fits nicely over the leggings like the picture shows. I like that it comes in an XS too. Excellent price. I think this will be really warm and comfortable beneath my snow gear. The scoop neck is comfortable under a t-neck without bunching up at the collar. Good buy. Good colors. I might get another set in another color. Iʻll wash it in cold water by itself - the purple is really solid and could run. Cold water, no dryer.
customer_reviews.author: JJR

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use the product as long underwear walking my dog in very cold weather. I read prior reviews. The product color most certainly does not come off on my hand. I bought the black that previous reviews claim otherwise. The material is soft and smooth. Fits like a glove and keeps me warm. The material does not shrink when washed. It is a great buy and I am very happy with the product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: THERMAL, yeah, right. NOT.
customer_reviews.text: My husband voiced what I was thinking when I opened the package; "SUMMER thermals???" You can see right through them, how can they call them "thermals"? I ordered a size larger because reviewers said they ran small. If you really want to get these, and I do NOT recommend it. order TWO sizes bigger. They are the worst "thermals" I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is not bad, but is so terribly made
customer_reviews.text: I am giving cero stars to this product. The fabric is not bad, but is so terribly made! The sleeves shoke my armpits, the sleeves do not fit, the pant is big in my waist but small in the legs. It came stained and dirty. Worse product I have ever got on amazon. Really disappointed. Sending back!
customer_reviews.author: Bka

customer_reviews.title: So warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I wish I could just wear this thermal set everywhere all the time--it's so warm and comfy! I bought it for a ski trip: The first day it was somewhere around 30 degrees and the sun was out, so I actually got too hot. The second day was overcast and also around 30 degrees, or maybe a bit cooler, and this thermal set kept me nice and warm. The fabric is very soft, easy to move around in, and the black color was not see-through at all. The leggings are my new go-to!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Sohaney

customer_reviews.title: Buy a pair now!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Great price for a great product! So much so I just ordered another pair. I put these on and have barely gone a day without them. So, so, so comfortable and warm. Nice fleece inside and nice smooth outer fabric, can slip your street clothes over these with ease, so and they are comfortable you don't notice you are wearing them but definitely noticeable when you are not. I have always lived in the Intermountain west and have worn many thermals, these are the best hands down! Especially for the price!!! Seller: received timely; shipping was environmentally conscience as avoided over-packaging,
customer_reviews.author: Karen G. Cordell

customer_reviews.title: I don't agree with other reviews about the fit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4'' between 150-165 curvy, small waist and the medium fits just fine. Room to spare in the waist of the leggings. The sleeves are a little short, but otherwise the fit is good. These are not as warm as my other thermals, but are still greatly appreciated during this cold weather. There is plenty of stretch in the fabric. The neckline doesn't scoop as wide as the photos. I'm glad though because why would you want a shoulder hugging thermal top? I've worn under jeans and other tops and do not find these to be bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: I also ordered the blue which fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: As far as warm, it's warm. But apparently they ran out of the size I ordered, they sent me one with ripped tags, in a bag that says "small" but it's clearly not a small. I can only wear it at home or to bed or something. It's too big for me to wear under my clothing. I also ordered the blue which fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Chanu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome winter pj's
customer_reviews.text: Ran a little on the small side so I ordered a size up and it's perfect. Super soft on the outside and like sweatshirt material on the inside without being too bulky. These are great to sleep in in the winter time. I ordered a few different colors and love them!
customer_reviews.author: MikesWife34

customer_reviews.title: Prefect Fit, Warm and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I gave my daughter the Thermal Fleece for Christmas a year ago, this past Christmas she asked for another one. I decided to try it out myself since I’m always cold. Best Thermal ever! Not only did it fit perfectly, it’s warm, comfortable and it looks great on. I plan to order a few more for myself and daughter. I only wish they had a side pocket as I wear them all the time around the house, nevertheless, I will be ordering them again for the both of us.
customer_reviews.author: SaundraM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for this winter!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear size SMALL in everything (pants, tops, dresses, all size 4) but after reading some of the reviews, I decided to order size MEDIUM and I'm glad I did. After going through the washer and dryer, the MEDIUM fits perfectly. We've had a very cold winter and this thermal set has been great for warmth and comfort. The fabric is soft and fuzzy and I'm going to order another set.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy. Spent 3 days learning skies totally warm
customer_reviews.text: Very good buy. Spent 3 days learning skies totally warm. Need for under costume. Sweat goes away with this one. Easy to wash and fast to dry. Can sleep in it too. Very cozy. Happy! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Ilona Nest

customer_reviews.title: Just really meh, honestly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear under clothes during a winter visit to NYC. The leggings were weirdly baggy in the crotch area and the top was weirdly narrow in the shoulders but baggy in the stomach/sleeves. The material was kinda weird...I guess I might use them as PJ's or clothes to paint in, as it seems like it would be more trouble than it's worth to return them. I'd only give them one star, but the fleece lining is softer than some other brands so I'll give them two.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna M.

customer_reviews.title: Large I don't think so more like a small medium!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what was wrong with this one I bought 3 in all and out of the three this one was terrible it's very small to be a large I'm going to keep it anyway but it's just the point I can't believe they had to throw one in there that was messed up and it doesn't even have a tag on it confirming the brand the other two are tagged an branded. So that confirms that this was something that was just thrown in now I understand the reviews. The other two were perfect !! Needed something lighter than my flannel pjs to lounge in and the 2 out of 3 was Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MsMeldeen

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves are short and wide
customer_reviews.text: These are being returned. I order them one size bigger than needed so that the sleeves and legs would be long but while the bottoms fit well and loose and even the fit of the top was good, the sleeves are very short and the openings are very wide. If worn under another garment, as I intended to do, the sleeves would ride and bunch. The inside of the thermals is lightly fleeced, definitely would keep you warm, but the short sleeves mean they are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Too much junk in my trunk.
customer_reviews.text: It fit for the most part but if you have junk in your trunk I suggest you go a size up. very warm and soft. Still had to wear layers but I'm always cold. I ordered the blue and orange, the blue is slightly darker and the orange is mustard color. Update: after the first wash they fit better. ++Update bought 2 sets for my grandmother she's tiny, but also well endowed, so I got her her a medium in deep blue and a small in dark purple. The colors are a little darker than I expected but we'll see if she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: AbejaReyna

customer_reviews.title: Cosy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and cuddly either as jammies or as a thermal layer for very cold outdoor activities. As the latter the fabric wicks well - never feels clammy - and the fleece is very cozy. I am short and dumpy - 5'3"and 140 lbs and medium is perfect. The waist of the bottoms is cut pretty high which might not please some. The front in particular is high. This suits my needs... I detest stretch under layers riding downwards till the crotch feels like it's heading for my knees. With a high waist they can be pinned in place by my trouser waistband. The price is great too!
customer_reviews.author: al tishal otiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Super warm!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'1" and 105lbs and got the size small. I bought this for snowboarding & also to wear underneath my pants as a base layer on cold days. Pros: Really warm! Fits really well. I usually find Amazon clothing difficult to purchase because it always ends up being too big, but the top on this is perfect! Cons: the pants are SUPER high-waisted. It doesn't fit underneath my jeans very well because the waist goes so high, but it works as a baselayer for snowboarding, or just lounging around the house for warmth. I'm also not too big of a fan of the scrunched waistband. Overall I recommend for warmth, but not for style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Im really disappointed with this purchase. I learned about this set in a blog and the blogger raved about it. I purchased it immediately and wasted no time in wearing it. The material is super soft and has a reasonable amount of stretch. However, the set did not fit properly. I am 5'4 and 180lbs. In pants, I am a size 14. I ordered the XL based on my measurements and the set did not fit. The shirt was too short and although the bottoms were stretchy, the waist would roll down if I bent over. Also, the crotch stitch opened immediately so I have a large hole in the groin area. Not ideal. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: First born child

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My wife normally uses Medium-sized clothing, but she decided to order a Large because she did not want it to fit very tight. It is indeed Large-sized, it fits her exactly as she was expecting (a bit loose). She wore it under her regular clothes and it kept her warm enough even when hitting -5 Celsius temperatures (having snowing and raining).
customer_reviews.author: Diego Acuña

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm thermals.
customer_reviews.text: Cold weather having come with vigor to Florida, I now appreciate the thermals I ordered. The leggings contain spandex that makes them light and able to fit smoothly under pants, without make the slacks catch on the tights. The top is a soft knit that is very comfortable. I did, however, try sleeping in the tights one night and by mid-morning when I was schlepping around, I realized that the leggings were becoming a bit restrictive. I do like them, but will probably not sleep in them again any time soon. Worn on a normally active day, they are comfortable and fine. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Word Maven

customer_reviews.title: Long Legs Short Arms Soft & Fluffy Thermals!
customer_reviews.text: I found the XXL size very confusing...the pants are more than long enough & fit wonderfully, but the top is SO tiny the arms barely pass my elbows & the waist does not reach the waist band of the pants! So the top fits small on the XXL, but the pants are fine. The set is, however, very soft & quite comfy for running around snug in the house on cool nights. And soft to sleep in as well.
customer_reviews.author: Surfin Luna

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION/order a size larger
customer_reviews.text: I HATE COLD. AND I work in a hospital. I'll try anything at this point, and as soon as I put these on 🤯 they were SOFT and NOT TOO THIN / THICK and WARM!! Glad I read the reviews about them running small because they absolutely do. I'm 103lbs and 5'1" and a medium fits me perfectly. Go figure. So order a size up for sure!! Already re-ordered a second pair while wearing the first pair :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Knock-Offs
customer_reviews.text: the product I received looked like something you pick up at walmart for maybe $20. Not a nice $40 set of thermals. The neckline on the shirt was not the nice wide boat neck cut shown in the example-- it was more like a normal t-shirt size (see photo). The shirt also fit a big snugly (to be expected) and the sleeves were weirdly short. The pants fit fine in length but was loose in the waistband. I am 5'5 and 160. I ordered an XL.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and soft inside
customer_reviews.text: I am a small and ordered a medium because of all the people complaining about too short and too whatever. I could have gone small but medium is just right. I am 5'3" 121 lbs. There is nothing too short about anything. I ordered white and will get the black in prob med again because I'm not getting any skinnier. Super warm and soft inside. People no one will see this it's going underneath your clothes. It's perfect and the price is the best I've found.
customer_reviews.author: nursesrok

customer_reviews.title: Way undersized and arms, waist & legs too short
customer_reviews.text: I read the fit recommendation that stated the fit was smaller than expected so I bought the set 2 sizes larger. The arms are too short the waist is way too short. The legs and trunk of the pants are both way too short. The bodice fit fine as long as I bought the larger size but these are way undersized for an average size person. It’s as if they are for a really petite short person. I discarded the packaging so I’m stuck with 2 sets that don’t fit. I’m very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Maggiesmom

customer_reviews.title: It would be too difficult to return so I'm just keeping it as clothes I don't mind getting dirty for painting or have work proje
customer_reviews.text: Did not appreciate this product for the cheap polyester fabric. It would be too difficult to return so I'm just keeping it as clothes I don't mind getting dirty for painting or have work projects where I know I will ruin whatever I'm wearing but this is not at all what i expected. Beyond cheap fabric. The fit also ezr emery boxy and unflattering. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Chen

customer_reviews.title: The material had a strong, unpleasant smell.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was what would be expected and the material is comfortable and warm. The only complaint would be that the fabric had a VERY strong smell out of the packaging. So strong that all other clothing that was washed with it then had the scent afterwards. It is a borderline pungent smell that I have never encountered before and I will not be purchasing this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Have worn them for a week and they fit well under my clothes and still keep me warm. I tend to get common colds when I go from warm to cold environments and, as I work at night, it was important to have clothes that keep me warm as I travel from home, to car, to work and back.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Wells

customer_reviews.title: Top-grade thermal wear
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thermal wear before a trip to Great Britain during a time I knew it would be chilly (COLD for ME) - was exactly what I needed; I'm so glad I had it with me. Not alot of need for it in So. Texas though, but if I lived in other parts of the U.S. this past winter, I'd have worn them out by now. :)
customer_reviews.author: Snooks

customer_reviews.title: Mistake Turned  Out Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Keeps me warm. And love the color. And it was bigger than I expected on the waist. And smaller on the arm and chest. I don’t mine buying another one. But I do have this one thing. It’s suppose to be thermal wear. Yet it does keep me warm. Either way!! Still fits and I love the color!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.Gillette

customer_reviews.title: bottoms run a little big
customer_reviews.text: Love the material but it was a little big for me. I'm size 4-6 and ordered a medium based on sizing chart plus didn't want it tight. The package said size X-large (Asian) which is equivalent to Medium (American) size. The top fit fine, not tight but comfortable, the bottoms though I could fit 2.5-3 of me so I gave it to someone that is a size 14-16 and it fit her, so next time I may have to order a small and just deal with a smaller top. It was perfect for my trip to Alaska though, breathable and used it while hiking and going on water trips.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Stinky material.
customer_reviews.text: The thermal underwear arrived with a terrible odor and there were black marks on the pants. We were leaving the next day to go skiing so I washed the items but the smell and black marks remained. These items definitely keep you warm and are very comfortable. Washed again while on ski trip. Smell remained. Hem came unstitched on top after second wash. Would recommend for warmth but hard to get around foul odor that remains on items.
customer_reviews.author: MDD

customer_reviews.title: Order at least a few sizes up, good and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as dedicated travel pajamas for an adventure trip. They fit the bill, very comfortable and easy to jump in to after a long day. I hate the differential in size. I ordered an extra large which fit the bill but was definitely snug. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chiti Kaunda

customer_reviews.title: Pants have a butt in the back and the front?!
customer_reviews.text: The pants fit WEIRD. It's like they made it for someone who has a butt in the front and the back? There is a gaping amount of fabric in the front near crotch. Almost hilarious. Not sure who this was designed for? LOL. Otherwise, fits OK. Only going to wear under other clothes, so still useable. My husband laughed so hard when I showed him
customer_reviews.author: arizona123

customer_reviews.title: Jack Frost...problem...I think not.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect. I have different levels of "long johns:" silks for lightweight warmth under dressier clothes and then I have sets like this one. This set does just what it offers. I like the silky smooth outer layer that doesn't catch on your clothes like old-style long johns AND the inner layer is a thin layer of fleece. Warm and cozy and not bunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The tag goes in the front!
customer_reviews.text: These have lasted for 3 winters (2 were in Wisconsin!), and I wear them a fair amount. The pants are so thin and breathable compared to other brands - I have literally forgotten a few times that I had them on. And you do appreciate the extra warmth - some of the more fashion-brands are really just another layer while this product holds in warmth. Last thing, they do run a bit small, but not as bad as many reviews have stated - I discovered the tags were sewn into the FRONT of the pants. If you hold them up, you can definitely see one side is cut more generously for the "seat" so put them on accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancie Fancie

customer_reviews.title: buy 2 sizes up
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 size up and the top is too tight and too short. The material is not nice to touch. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Short & tight, but warm.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife to wear as a base layer. She's a slim lady & usually wears a medium in everything. I got her an XL. The XL is small for my medium sized wife. It fits snugly and it's quite short in the sleeves and legs. It works great for under other clothes, as it doesn't stick out, but it would be better if the cut were a good bit longer, especially considering the size. --> Whatever size you normally wear - get two sizes larger & expect a snug (but comfortable), short fit <-- All that said about the size, my wife wears hers a good bit & it does help keep her warm.
customer_reviews.author: Tip DS

customer_reviews.title: Thermal underwear a big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This item is not described by seller unless I received a different order. First of all, it is not lined in fleece as described, just a very thin material that's considered fleece by the manufacturer, item not warm nor comfortable. Pants does not stay on at waist keeps slipping down, because it was worn underneath a pair of slacks at first I didn't mind, however, when washed and line-dried, top and bottom shrunk. If I didn't wear and wash it, item would have been returned. I would not recommend this nor does it rate one star.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Size not cut the same across colors!
customer_reviews.text: I bought five different colors of these thermal underwear sets, all in the same size (XL). After washing, I wore each one. Only TWO out of the five colors fit properly. In the other three colors, the bottoms did not come up all the way properly, and the sleeves did not cover my wrists. Other than that, these are very comfy, and nice and warm for the coldest of the three winters I have been in South Carolina so far.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Great except for gaps in seams
customer_reviews.text: First the good news. I love the fabric on these - really soft and comfy. I'm never sure wether to order a medium or large. I went with the large on these and they fit well. Now for the bad. There's a six inch gap in the seam on the right calf, and a one inch gap in the crotch seam. Easier to get out a needle and thread than to return them, but disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: DMW

customer_reviews.title: ARMS ON TOP SHORT
customer_reviews.text: If you have long arms don't buy this set. My arms aren't particularly long, but the sleeves on this top come up practically to my elbows! Not what I expected. And it runs very small. I purchased an x-large and am usually a woman's size 8 and they are snug. They are warm, but disappointed in the top.
customer_reviews.author: Busybarb Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These are not warm whatsoever. They have a “fleece” like lining, in the regards that they’re super soft on the inside but that’s about it. Sweatpants and/or a sweatshirt that you may already own would be much warmer so don’t waste your money. Very cheaply made and thin. Package said it sells for $34.99 so I thought I was getting this amazing deal only buying for $20. I wouldn’t spend more than $5 on the set now that I own them.
customer_reviews.author: fervent droll pancake

customer_reviews.title: I need more of these!
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to have to order more sets of these thermal undergarments because they truly lived up my expectations. Wore them on a cold and rainy day and barely noticed they were there. Not only did they keep me warm but the fit was perfect. No pinching. No bunching up at the elbows and inside the knees. No riding up my leg if I sat down or crouched. Perfect fit. I followed the recommendations as to sizing and I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: E. F. Paredes

customer_reviews.title: Fit small
customer_reviews.text: These were very soft and warm. Fit very small though. Order at least one size bigger than what you need. (If you order two sizes bigger it would probably fit perfectly). We ordered 3 pairs for different people in the family. The fabric gives and will eventually stretch if you force it except where it is sewn together. The arm holes are very tight and will rub you raw. If you can get the right size they are Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misled and Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews thoroughly prior to making a decision. I truly wanted the set in purple but the purple ones don't come in XXL so I ordered black in XXL. The size was still TOO SMALL by about 2 sizes. The sleeves are about 2 inches too short. The material is so flimsy and thin, how that qualifies as fleece, I'll never know. It says 100% cotton on the package. Which is it? The cheap packaging has a bold $39.95 printed on it. Drop the 3 from $39.95 and the pricing would be comparable to the product. I'm stuck with something I cannot use nor want. Misled and disappointed.....
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Very soft & warm
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot, perfect size, I'm 5 ft & weigh 118 lbs. The medium size is perfect if you wear size med top & 5 ft tall.
customer_reviews.author: Delia S

customer_reviews.title: Those are great!! I work outdoors as a bike taxi ...
customer_reviews.text: I also bought the hanes thermal underwear long in black when I got this. Those are great!! I work outdoors as a bike taxi so I need to be warm. I look for durable, comfortable, warm, efficient and something that looks great. This is NOT these ones. The material seems cheap, the cut around the neck and stuff seems a bit slanted. They just feel cheap and I found I wasn't getting the type of heat I needed. They also don't dry from sweat well. I think you can find better
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $19.99 - cheaper at Target!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Small which fit except the arms were too short. The leggings were not comfortable at the waist. I returned them only to find Target have thermal sets for better quality & a lot cheaper! Save your money - go to Target!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: A bit snugger than expected, but lovely and comfortable fabric, not bulky under winter layers, work great as PJ's.
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit too snug. I'm washing them carefully and hanging them to dry lest they shrink. They are nice and warm! VERY nice texture and they fit very smoothly so you don't see the lines. Caught them on a rough surface and they resisted snagging. The color is nice and is not fading/bleeding. I wish they were available a size larger and I would like to buy more sets in other colours. A plump woman needs warm clothes from time to time, too. If I lose twenty pounds or more, they'll be very comfortable, so wish me luck....
customer_reviews.author: William R. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. I purchased a medium size and it was a comfortable fit for me. I am 5'7" slim and 112lbs. I typically run small but I wanted the next size up, and this worked great for me. This thermal set is very soft, breathable, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Fay Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Okay set, but waistband on pants too tight to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the soft material, but the waistband was too tight. I normally wear a small (4-6) in everything, but due to the reviews I ordered a medium in this set. In order to wear these and not return them, I had to rip one small section of the waistband on the pants and actually cut the elastic in that area. At least I can now wear them, but don't know if this will eventually make the waist band totally disappear. I had read on line a while ago that this was an option for elastic pants that were too tight, but never had to do it until now. The top fits great. I probably wouldn't buy this again..
customer_reviews.author: Rere

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These were very comfortable. The size guides were helpful as I probably would have ordered a medium based on my normal sizing. After reviewing I discovered that I needed a size Large. Pay attention to the sizing! I purchased to wear while skiing. After day 1, the top had a small hole in the front of the shirt. Nowhere near any seam or anything - just right in the middle. Since it is an undergarment, it's not that big of a deal but definitely something to consider as you're comparing items to make a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey N

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, seems like it'll keep me warm in ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, seems like it'll keep me warm in Madrid. I ordered a Small, I'm 5'3 and 108 pounds. After reading the reviews I was scared they would fit too small but the bottoms actually fit a little loosely. Nothing worth exchanging them for, seems like the sizing just depends on the individuals body. I was happy with my purchase so I ordered two additional sets.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Fit slightly smaller than expected, but these make an excellent base layer for cold temperatures
customer_reviews.text: I got this last minute hoping to take them with me for a weekend away in the Adirondacks in New York. I received them the day I was leaving and did not even open the package until I got there. I wore these in below freezing temperatures as a base layer for snowmobiling and various other snow activities. They fit slightly smaller than I would have hoped, but overall they were comfortable and warm. In this case you get what you pay for, these are not top of the line thermals, but with proper layering they are a great base layer.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great product-not your mother's long johns
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 pair of these for the freezing night temps & they are terrific. Keep you warm & cozy under clothing or just under a bathrobe. The fit is good, they wash & dry well. Buying more with my Christmas money. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LMJ

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Cozy without the bulk
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully warm and cozy. These are light and airy yet very warm and comfortable. They are lightly lined with fleece so it's not too overpowering or bulky. I would equate it to a light, extra soft sweatshirt. They are thin enough to be worn under your clothing and not show during the cold weather. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: RAN A LITTLE SMALL, BUT GREAT PRODUCT, IF YOU WANT TO KEEP WARM AND BLOCK THE WIND. TOOK TO NEW YORK IN FEBRUARY AND THEY WHERE A LIFE SAVER. I REALLY NOTICED THE DIFFERENCE WHEN I WENT OUT ONE NIGHT WITHOUT THEM. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Rothermel

customer_reviews.title: Warm buns.
customer_reviews.text: They fit. Just a little bit small. Not too worried, as I had layers on top also. They were extremely warm. I was in Japan, in the snow, about 10 degrees and I was a little sweaty inside these bad boys. My face was cold but my buns was warm.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Newbold

customer_reviews.title: Very oddly fitting, not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’4. 115 lbs and ordered a medium set. The shirt fit fine and was warm, though a little unflattering in the mid section since it was not form-fitting. The pants were NOT medium and instead seemed like an XXS in the waist! The legs fit fine yet the crouch was really baggy... the pants are the main reason I’m returning and I wasn’t thrilled with the top though it would have done okay.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Ter Keurst

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a nice fit at extra large
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and a nice fit at extra large. I returned the large. I am a medium in most things. The large top was too snug while the large bottoms fit nicely, but I decided I would be uncomfortable in the top so ordered the next size up. The extra large top was comfortable and did its job. The extra large bottoms were a little long but comfortable and were fine! The set washes well.
customer_reviews.author: nbrowning

customer_reviews.title: Amazing warmth!
customer_reviews.text: This is even better than some UNIQLO Heatech underwear that I'd been loving for years. I fear that I might have bought a larger size than usual (I'm usually a XS-S, but the S here feels like a M to me), but I would imagine it being fabulous if it fits perfectly to me. However, I cannot emphasise how warm the interior is and how well it blocks out the wind. This underwear can fight the cold of Chicago weather, so it must work for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The material is soft to the touch and has some stretch to it making it comfortable for her to wear as a layer underneath her ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my 86yo grandma, who is particular when it comes to fabrics on her skin. The material is soft to the touch and has some stretch to it making it comfortable for her to wear as a layer underneath her regular clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Wooley Household

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: Kept me warm in 34 degrees F in New York. and when I thought I was going to be cold at night I slept with the pants but it kept me so warm I had to take them off! (AC was at 68) They are comfortable and can easily be warm under clothes without notice.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Get a size or two larger than you think you'll need
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6, size 4-6 pants and xs-s shirts depending on the brand (cough h&m cough) and the large fits great. Overestimate on the sizing and you will be rewarded with great quality thermals. The material is satiny on the outside so it's super easy to get skinny jeans over them.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jones

customer_reviews.title: You must be tall and slender for extra large!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered extra large! The material in the chest area was way to tight for a larger busted woman! Usually extra large drowns me. I am 5" 2" and 140 lbs. However my daughter is 5' 6" and 137 lbs and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Size UP! Way Up.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart is useless. I am 180lbs, 5’6 so I went a size up and got 16-18 thinking I’d have a little extra room as I am a size 14. This was a crop top on me and the sleeves were short-past my wrists. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Dimick

customer_reviews.title: Keep warm
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's pretty good. It's just one size relationship. If you have a big physique. I don't think I can wear it. Basically keep warm after it gets cold. Can choose to see。
customer_reviews.author: dan dan zhang

customer_reviews.title: Warm but sheer
customer_reviews.text: These run slightly smaller than you’d expect. But very warm and soft. The only negative is that the pants are slightly sheer (booty)... wear under regular leggings or pants for warmth and they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little bit "meh"
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is a little suspicious. I ordered two of these, in different sizes because medium was a bit too small, but still wearable. Each item was packaged differently - the first item came without any packaging, and the second item came in its packaging. They aren't even the same brand or the same exact cut, just "similar." I am happy with what I purchased, but I think the overall cost including shipping was too high for what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Changed my opinion on leggings as pants
customer_reviews.text: I've never understood the whole, wearing leggings as pants fad. I always thought leggings were meant for working out. But these leggings have totally changed my mind. They don't stretch out, and they're so soft. Easily worn for casual outfit. I love them. The high waist is so flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric feel.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. I always order xlarge. This item fit, but a little bit too snug. Not shipping back, gave to a friend whose one size smaller than me.
customer_reviews.author: TheBreeze

customer_reviews.title: Not for Under Clothes
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit close to the body, it's not stretchy. I find it to be uncomfortable under close fitting jeans. The shirt is totally unwearable under clothes. I wear these as pajamas and they are very warm. I bought them for a warm layer under clothes and I couldn't use them that way.
customer_reviews.author: Ayana

customer_reviews.title: Shame on me.. I didn't read Instructions
customer_reviews.text: They are quite nice just the right amount of warmth for pajamas or under clothing for the NJ area. But I Didn't read all the instructions cause my arms were way to short and the top s bottom my belly was showing . It had said to order size up. But shame on me, so sending back no problem free of charge and reordered size bigger. I love them I want all the colors ! So Read your Instructions Lil..
customer_reviews.author: SpiritDog Casciano

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pairs of these for a trip to Finland. They worked just fine, and kept me nice and warm. The sleeves were a bit short on me, I bought a small, and they fit well, but I think a medium would have been a good fit too.
customer_reviews.author: Marni

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size up and glad I did. Super comfy and warm. I like the softness of the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Scheer

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable, soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size medium - I'm 5'4" and 130lbs. Medium fit well but I haven't put them in the dryer because if they shrink AT ALL they will be too small. I bought them for camping and when I was taking the top off after the first day of wearing it, I noticed a hole in the seam along the arm/shoulder area. Although, for the price, I guess I didn't expect the highest quality. They are very comfortable, soft, and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Moring

customer_reviews.title: Nice thermals.
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother loves this thermal set. The brown matches her skin and she wears them under most of her outfits, even after the winter season because she gets cold. This set is soft, comfy, and not bulky. Thin but warm.
customer_reviews.author: Nish

customer_reviews.title: Packaging for different product??
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning these. What arrived was packaging for Nine's brand 100% Cotton Lady's Thermal Set, described as a waffle knit. But there is a sticker on it that just says "92% polyester, 8% spandex". What's inside is more like the product described in user reviews, clearly polyester. Yet the shirt has a Nine's label sewn in it that says 100 percent cotton (even though it's clearly poly), while the pants have no label in them at all. Im not impressed with the quality aside from all this sketchiness, so I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: LCW

customer_reviews.title: These fit nicely under ski pants and of course under layers of ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a trip to Iceland in January.I wore these every day that I knew we would be outdoors for an extended period of time. These fit nicely under ski pants and of course under layers of sweaters. The inside of the set is a fleece-like material that is really soft and comfortable. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha T.

customer_reviews.title: I order a small and they sent me a medium ...
customer_reviews.text: I order a small and they sent me a medium. The packaging noted that the sizes run small and to fit a US small, it sized up which is typically true for Asian clothes. I wished that was mentioned in the description. I would have purchased an extra small instead. I got the violet and the color was more vibrant than I expected but it doesn't bother me since it's a under layer.
customer_reviews.author: Hli

customer_reviews.title: mind the gap if you’re tall
customer_reviews.text: I wish the top was a few inches longer, there’s a chilly gap between bottom of shirt and top of pants. While this is typical for most things on y’all women, it’s particularly hard when it’s an underlayer for warmth. Color is great, they’re soft and wash well on delicate (hang to dry).
customer_reviews.author: K. Helms

customer_reviews.title: I should have ordered my normal size... ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered my normal size...I went up to a L per reviewers recommendations and it's too big. One purchaser in the question and answer section states the label says it is 100% cotton. There is no cotton content at all hence I find the fabric personally, to be uncomfortable. I will never wear this and am hoping to return it. It does not say anything about returns policies in the description nor content of this product which I regard as warning signs. .
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Follow the review advice and get a size larger then you normally would!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5 and weigh roughly 110. I read all the reviews on this product, followed their advice in buying a larger size (medium for me), and just received them in the mail... They fit perfectly!!! If I'd have gone with a small the wouldn't have fit at all. So far product feels quite warm and is easy to put other layers over (even my skinny jeans).
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: Not orange.
customer_reviews.text: The lg size and comfort is fine. I'm 4'9 weigh 144 lbs. I'm normally between a med/lg. The lg. works especially the pants. I gave a one star because the color is not orange. They should call it dijon mustard. On camera it looks orange and bright. I tried to edit to it's true color. It's not bright, more of a dull yellow.
customer_reviews.author: ctalking

customer_reviews.title: A comfy warm set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my sister who went to Northern New York for a week in January to take my niece to college. Based on all of the feedback, I bought her an x-large instead of a large and she said the fit was great. Wore them under her clothes every day.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora2288

customer_reviews.title: definitely go one size up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the yellow color to use as a base layer camping during cooler months. I had only a pair of wind resistant pants and a t-shirt, long sleeve, and jacket worn over them and it kept me nice and toasty well into 30 degree temps. I did listen to the other reviews that suggest to go one size up. I usually wear a small and bought the medium. It fit perfectly, very form fitting as a base layer should be. I am not sure about the other colors, but the yellow bottoms are a bit see through though so they are not too good for wearing on their own.
customer_reviews.author: AK

product_meta.title: UYES Women's Thermal Underwear Set Top & Bottom Fleece Lined
product_meta.description: The package will include 2 Pieces Fleece Lined Thermal Set (Top & Bottom Ultra Soft and Comfortable. Warm, but not bulky! Great to be Wear Alone at Home or Add an Extra Layer of Warmth Under Your Clothes Machine Wash Cold. Tumble Dry Medium.
feature_bullets: Please order the size refer to the size chart on the left image
2 Pieces Fleece Lined Thermal Set (Top & Bottom)
Great to be Wear Alone at Home or Add an Extra Layer of Warmth Under Your Clothes
Available in many colors for you to choose from
